heading: HR02531
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE DUTERTE ADMINISTRATION TO DISCLOSE TO THE PUBLIC THE DIFFERENT LOAN AGREEMENTS SIGNED BY THE PHILIPPINE GOVERNMENT WITH CHINA AS WELL AS THE ASSETS OR NATURAL RESOURCES OF THE COUNTRY THAT WAS MADE AS COLLATERAL IN EXCHANGE FOR THESE APPROVED LOANS
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2019-05-20
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02531
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE DUTERTE ADMINISTRATION TO DISCLOSE TO THE PUBLIC THE DIFFERENT LOAN AGREEMENTS SIGNED BY THE PHILIPPINE GOVERNMENT WITH CHINA AS WELL AS THE ASSETS OR NATURAL RESOURCES OF THE COUNTRY THAT WAS MADE AS COLLATERAL IN EXCHANGE FOR THESE APPROVED LOANS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2019-03-27
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2019-05-20
